column4: parted does not get my raid10 right while installation, so i cant install 10.10 on my desktop, any way to fix it? (4x250GB SATA) on minimal or CD Installation (64bit)
No, you have FakeRAID, not true hardware RAID.
Did you try the alternate install CD yet?
And could you file a bug report with "ubuntu-bug ubiquity" about the problem you're having with the live installer?
